channel.title: Help me learn how to change what npc's say!
channel.description: :D Hi its coder thomas and coder nicky we just made a sever a month ago and we need help changing what the npc says. exp genies and gurads saying something differnt like "welcome to the sanits!

item.title: Help me learn how to change what npc's say!
item.dc:creator: @508_Client 508_Client
item.description:
@508_Client wrote:

Search this in your Npchandler.java

npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to ------"; Replace the ---- with what the npc is saying.

You should find something like this

//if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCIDHERE) { //if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { //npcs[i].updateRequired = true; //npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; //npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to ------"; //}

Modify the npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to ------"; To what you want it to say.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me learn how to change what npc's say!
